Warehouse Keeper Radic:
Hello, adventurer! Welcome to the Ivory Tower. Leave your belongings here and go sightseeing. You're on the 1st floor now. On the higher floors there are various guilds - for Mystics, Wizards, Enchanters. Our tower is practically a wizards' settlement created by wizards for other wizards.
Long time ago, in the age of the Elmoreden empire, the Ivory Tower's power and influence were unrivaled. The wizards could have taken control over the whole continent, would they have wished so...
